title: Drawing, ca. 1801
medium: Gouache and graphite on pale blue laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left, monogram: LD 408
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Horizontal rectangle or four vignettes.  Upper left, a pink fountain; upper right, an urn containing a flowering tree; lower left, yellow house; lower right, a pink garden wall and two ducks in a pond.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, ca. 1801.
ca. 1801. Gouache and graphite on pale blue laid paper. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1957-46-94.
